string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: Which planet has the most moons?
Which planet spins on its side?

string-array.name: answers
string-array.item: Jupiter is the largest planet and is 2.5 times the mass of all the other planets put together.
Saturn has the most moons and has 82 moons.
Uranus spins on its side with its axis at nearly a right angle to the sun.
